tag_list: bobex, marketplace, belgium, europe, ebusiness, entrepreneur, b2b, venture
overview:
Jean-Louis is an entrepreneur with broad experience in all aspects of setting up and managing ventures.

He co-founded and is CEO of Bobex.com, the leading B2B marketplace in Europe.

Past experience:

  • Senior Consultant at Arthur D. Little Inc. (Belgium, France)
  • Founder & General Manager of Shanghai Stow Storage Equipment Ltd. (China)

Education: MBA - University of Chicago - Graduate School of Business, High Honors Master in Management - Vlerick Leuven-Gent Management School, Honors BA in Economics - KU Leuven

degrees.subject: Entrepreneurship & Finance
degrees.institution: University of Chicago - Booth School of Business
